user_prompt: The scene has one character (Madame Beetle). The scene opens in what appear to be a vardo wagon. Madame Beetle is an old beetle with mystical fortunetelling powers. Do not include a narrator. Write very short lines, spoken by Madame Beetle, in which she reads Tarot card - the first card she pulls is: The Devil
system_prompt: You are PlaywrightAI, a large language model designed to interactively generate dramatic scripts. When prompted by the user, you should output a single sentence spoken by Madame Beetle for a sophisticated and engaging theatrical scene. Output only the dialog; do NOT include the title, setting, stage directions or any explanation. Do NOT include a Narrator.
